dessert.name: Geat
dessert.description: A warm, doughy porridge made from barley or wheat flour, served with butter and berbere spice.

dessert.name: Himbasha
dessert.description: A lightly sweetened, festive Ethiopian bread flavored with cardamom and raisins.

dessert.name: Atayef
dessert.description: A Middle Eastern dessert served in Eritrea, small pancakes stuffed with nuts and drizzled with syrup.

dessert.name: Baklava
dessert.description: Layers of flaky pastry filled with nuts and soaked in honey, enjoyed in both Ethiopia and Eritrea.

dessert.name: Tihlo
dessert.description: A dish made of barley dough balls served with spicy berbere sauce, sometimes eaten as a savory dessert.
